宂字的基本解释

宂
rǒng
同“冗”。

宂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rǒng］
［《廣韻》而隴切，上腫，日。］
亦作“1”。亦作“冗1”。
(1)闲散。
(2)多余。
(3)繁杂。
(4)忙。
(5)驽下；庸劣。
(6)离散。

宂字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　宂； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页281第13
【唐韻】【正韻】而隴切【集韻】【韻會】乳勇切，?戎上聲。【說文】散也。从宀，人在屋下，無田事也。古設官分職，有宂員備使令。【周禮·夏官】稾人掌共外內朝宂食者之食。【註】謂外內朝上直諸吏，謂之宂吏，亦曰散吏。【續漢志】有宂從僕射。【註】散從也。　又【增韻】雜也，剩也，忙也。今無事備員曰宂官。蘇軾曰：爲政在去三宂，曰宂官，宂兵，宂費。　又民無定居曰宂。【後漢·光武詔】流宂道路，朕甚愍之。　又【集韻】戎用切。義同。　又【正字通】俗从几作宂。或作冗，?非。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［rǒng］
["Guangyun" and Long cut, swollen on the top, day. ]
Also known as "1". Also referred to as "redundant 1".
(1) Idleness.
(2) Redundant.
(3) Complex.
(4) Busy.
(5) Poor; mediocre.
(6) Discrete.

[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] and Long Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ru Yong cut, Rong Shangsheng. [Said the text] San also. Congluo, people are under the house, and there is nothing to do. Gu set up the official division of office, there is an order to prepare the emperor. [Zhou Li·Xiaguan] The people of Ji held the food of the eater. [Note] It is said that the outside and the inside are straight up, and it is called the official, and it is also called the scattered official. [Continued Han Zhi] There is a 宂-Cong-pu shot. [Note] San Cong also.　[Zeng Yun] Miscellaneous, leftover, busy. Today, there is nothing to be prepared for, called the court official. Su Shi said: "We are going to the third court for politics, saying that court officials, soldiers, and fees."　There is no settling down in the people, and it is said to be 宂. [Later Han·Guangwu Zhao] Liu Lu road, I was shocked.　[Jiyun] Rong with cut. The same meaning.　[Zhengzitong] Popular from Jizuo. Or be redundant, or not.
